DOC.brief_summary: To determine the morbidity and mortality of patients who have undergone percutaneous tracheostomy due to respiratory failure in the critical care unit and after intensive care in the internal medicine department, including follow-up of quality of life of these patients.
DOC.brief_title: Outcome Evaluation of Patients After Percutaneous Tracheostomy Due to Respiratory Failure in an Intensive Care Unit
DOC.criteria: Mechanically ventilated critical care patients All others
